idAbs.para: Evaluates on a cell-by-cell basis the number of times a set of rasters is less than another raster.

summary.para: Evaluates on a cell-by-cell basis the number of times a set of rasters is less than another raster.

pythonReference.para: For each cell location in the input value raster, the number of occurrences (frequency) where a raster in the input list has a lesser value is counted.

dialogReference.para: For each cell location in the input value raster, the number of occurrences (frequency) where a raster in the input list has a lesser value is counted.

pythonReference.para: The list of rasters that will be compared against the value raster.

dialogReference.para: The list of rasters that will be compared against the value raster.

pythonReference.para: For each cell in the output raster, the value represents the number of times that the corresponding cells in the list of rasters is less than the value raster.

dialogReference.para: For each cell in the output raster, the value represents the number of times that the corresponding cells in the list of rasters is less than the value raster.

bullet_item.para: An arbitrary number of rasters can be specified in the input rasters list.
If a cell location contains NoData on any of the input rasters, that location will be assigned NoData on the output.
The output raster is always of integer type.

scriptExample.title: LessThanFrequency example 1 (Python window)
scriptExample.para: This example evaluates the number of times a set of input GRID rasters is less than another raster and outputs the result as an IMG raster.
scriptExample.code: import arcpy from arcpy import env from arcpy.sa import * env.workspace = "C:/sapyexamples/data" outLTF = LessThanFrequency("cost", ["degs", "negs", "fourgrd"]) outLTF.save("C:/sapyexamples/output/outltf.img")

scriptExample.title: LessThanFrequency example 2 (stand-alone script)
scriptExample.para: This example evaluates the number of times a set of input GRID rasters is less than another raster and outputs the result as an IMG raster.
scriptExample.code:
# Name: LessThanFrequency_Ex_02.py # Description: Evaluates the number of times a set of rasters is # less than another raster # Requirements: Spatial Analyst Extension # Author: ESRI
# Import system modules import arcpy from arcpy import env from arcpy.sa import *
# Set environment settings env.workspace = "C:/sapyexamples/data"
# Set local variables inValueRaster = "cost" inRaster01 = "degs" inRaster02 = "negs" inRaster03 = "fourgrd"
# Check out the ArcGIS Spatial Analyst extension license arcpy.CheckOutExtension("Spatial")
# Execute LessThanFrequency outLTF = LessThanFrequency(inValueRaster, [inRaster01, inRaster02, inRaster03])
# Save the output outLTF.save("C:/sapyexamples/output/outltf")
